item.title: Teaching Plan of Periscope
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: class: middle center text-light bg-info Teaching Plan of Periscpe CyrusN Background 55 mins Target: F3 No of students: 26 Objective 鏡像反射定律 加強學生利用平面圖展示立體圖形 例如可用開展讓學生更能了解 了解直角等腰三角形的.text-danger[斜邊與高]的比例 $\sqrt{2}:1$ 有助學生了解三角的特別角 增潤知識 A 系紙的長闊比為 $\sqrt{2}:1$ $\sqrt{2}:1$ （白銀比例）的應用 A4 紙的長闊比 白銀比例 - Wikipedia A4 紙的長闊比 長：297mm 濶：210mm Ratio: $\displaystyle \frac{297}{210}=1.41 (3 sig. fig.)$ Making of .overflow[ ]

item.title: Tutorial on Google Script
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: class: center, middle, bg-info, text-light Tutorial on Google Script Cyrus Ngan Objectives - Mock Interview Workshop Create a google form Application for Mock Interview Workshop User can choose his / her name in a list User can apply at most .mark[5 courses] for the mock interview User should enter Course ID in JUPAS User should enter link of the course information 10 pages slide to complete the simple tutorial class: center middle bg-dark text-light

item.title: 提升生產力及專注力
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: class: center middle bg-info text-light 提升生產力及專注力 GTD & 蕃茄工作法 Reference The Pomodoro Technique® - proudly developed by Francesco Cirillo | Cirillo Company David Allen’s Getting Things Done® Methodology 工作時間 平日每天約4小時 假日每天約6小時 合共： 4hr x 5day + 6hr x 2day = 32 hrs 如何保持專注? 規劃 每科應用15分鐘回顧及整理當天所學 功課應盡早完成 每天用盡所有工作時間 流程 .overflow.h-75[ ![workflow] ] Why? 何時做 > 何時交 計時能令人集中 e.g. 考試、測驗 .row[ .
